doc:
Richard Gibson https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Gibson 0 Richard Gibson (born 1 January 1954) is an English actor, probably best known for his role as the archetypal Gestapo Officer Herr Otto Flick in the BBC hit sitcom series, 'Allo 'Allo!. Richard_Gibson ( born 1_January_1954 ) is an_English_actor , probably best_known for his_role as the_archetypal_Gestapo_Officer_Herr_Otto_Flick in the_BBC hit sitcom_series , ' Allo_'_Allo ! .
